feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add anthropic connection test func by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1341
  • fix(ENG-2161): executor race condition fix by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1344

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.3...v0.18.4

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.19.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add k8s connection test function by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1342
  • feat(python): Switch to uv by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1245
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2 from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1340
  • feat(store): add by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1338
  • feat(ENG-2165): external dispatching by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.4...v0.19.0

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.19.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add AirTable integration by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1328
  • fix(ENV-2170): make uv install correctly in containers by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1348
  • fix: return 429 rate limit on webhook if exhausted by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1349

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.19.0...v0.19.1

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.19.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add gspread pysdk by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1351
  • feat: add reddit integration by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1347
  • fix(python): Shutdown gRPC server on load error by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1354
  • fix: remove tenacity dup by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1352
  • fix: Install py-sdk with [all] extras in Docker by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1356
  • feat(pysdk): allow base_url when using oauth2_session by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1355
  • feat: add descriptions to vars by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1357
  • fix(ENG-2176): cancelled workflows did not notify on end by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.19.1...v0.19.2

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.19.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ENG-2171: add external sessions triggering so limiter would work by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1350
  • chore: upgrade web platform by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1359

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.19.2...v0.19.3
